question: SOME PEOPLE SAY INTERNATIONAL SPORTS EVENTS HELP WORLD PEACE.DO YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE.
text: For the past decades,  international sports have become our symbol of rivalry and entertainment as well as a  friendship connection for oversea countries. During performing activities, people around the world get to know each other and build  better collaboration between nations. So I strongly unify the opinion of the article as it has been contributing the peaceful statement to every individual.

First and foremost, there are countless advantages of carrying out athletics since being active can construct the muscles and strength along with level up the stamina stage as well as boost the immune system standard . For example, according to health research conducted by scientists, a person who is vigorously involving sports gain a higher number of flexibility and endurance compared to the unfit community. Therefore, the contributor of regularly exercising is indeed crucial for the quality of human's living.

On the other hand ,besides healthcare issues, competition is one of the circumstances for linking people by the observance of one's union. To illustrate, the  setting of battling generate a feeling of  amusing thus competitors are willing to endeavour in the game notably. This kind of situation has studied by some psychological experts, their result shows that when people are contesting with professional opponents, the public usually finds that it is interesting for them in order to explore other's potential together with their limit's ability. As a result, these components have upgraded the status of a pastime and entertained the audience hence an amiable surrounding is created. Moreover, society is presumed to strengthen the association.

To conclude, aside from achieving better health maintenance as an assistant in term of dealing with the illness.Also, the goal of bonding between the global population through the fun on the account of spawning a harmonious background then my essay agree with the topic.
